title: aborted connection doesn't show error in error dashboard
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v5.0, also probably master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
Doesn't matter.

### Steps to reproduce
I don't have steps to reproduce. What I have observed is I can see a connection is aborted in logs, but see nothing in graph "Server report failures".

### What did you expect?
"Server report failures" should show all connections abnormal.

### What did happened?
It's empty.
